```{r load and explore}
library(tidyverse)
df.pl <- read.csv("../data/23_24_match_details.csv")
colnames(df.pl)
df.pl <- df.pl |>
  filter(!is.na(events)) |>
  filter(!is.na(id)) |>
  select(c("id", "events"))

df.pl

write.csv(df.pl, file = "../data/clean_comm_data.csv")

```
